policy.Description: Provides read-only access to AWS DataSync

actions.Description: Grants permission to view metadata such as name, network interfaces, and the status (that is, whether the agent is running or not) about a sync agent
Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon EFS sync location
Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information about an Amazon FSx Windows sync location
Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information, about a NFS sync location
Grants permission to view metadata about a self-managed object storage server location
Grants permission to view metadata, such as bucket name, about an Amazon S3 bucket sync location
Grants permission to view metadata, such as the path information, about an SMB sync location
Grants permission to view metadata about a sync task
Grants permission to view metadata about a sync task that is being executed
Grants permission to list agents owned by an AWS account in a region specified in the request
Grants permission to list source and destination sync locations
Grants permission to list tags that have been added to the specified resource
Grants permission to list executed sync tasks
Grants permission to list of all the sync tasks
Grants permission to describe one or more security groups
Grants permission to describe one or more subnets

Grants permission to view the description of an Amazon EFS file system specified by file system CreationToken or FileSystemId; or to view the description of all file systems owned by the caller's AWS account in the AWS region of the endpoint that is being called
Grants permission to view the descriptions of all mount targets, or a specific mount target, for a file system
Grants permission to return the descriptions of all file systems owned by your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified role, including the role's path, GUID, ARN, and the role's trust policy
Grants permission to list the IAM roles that have the specified path prefix
Returns all the log groups that are associated with the AWS account making the request
Return all the resource policies in this account.
Grants permission to list all buckets owned by the authenticated sender of the request
Grants permission to list some or all of the objects in an Amazon S3 bucket (up to 1000)
